name: Factory Magnate
storyline:
Factory Magnate puts you in the shoes of an industrious factory engineer with a small loan of a million credits. Your goal is to build an empire of factories spanning multiple planets in a procedurally generated solar system. You'll be building factories and entering into contracts with local companies to produce a wide range of products. But can you beat your competitors in the race for the distinguished title of Factory Magnate? 
 
* Make landfall on planets and establish new factory sites. 
 
* Build factories to accommodate the needs of local companies. Companies will switch things up every now and then, forcing you to continuously adjust factory production lines. 
 
* Enter into short and long term contracts, committing to deliver a steady supply of products. 
 
* Build relations with companies, affecting your chances of earning more money and even better relations. 
 
* Compete against AI companies who are trying to win the same contracts as you. 
 
* Unlock new factory unit upgrades and product lines.
summary: A factory tycoon set in a procedurally generated solar system. Build factories and sell your manufactured products. Diversify and redesign factories as demands change. Do you have what it takes to outsmart the competition and earn the title of Factory Magnate?
